website_summaries.verdict: A solid solution for those with full-sized beds that run long.
pros: Provides good mattress stability for most
cons: Customers report slats about an inch longer than standard full-size frame

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I have an antique full sized bed and the old slats were coming out all the time and causing problems. This works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Vavra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for my full bed. I ordered a Casper with a box spring for support but it was to short. Come to find out Casper’s full is 53” and not 54”. I ordered these to support everything and they worked out great. And arrived the next day after ordering it. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fix the product name description
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut 1/2 inch of them to make them fit on the new bed frame I bought but lucky for me i had a jigsaw so thats what i used and it worked out just fine, though i am disappointed that the description was incorrect about the product i bought as the picture said slats only but not the heading title of the product in question
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Crack when Drilled
customer_reviews.text: Though they did fit into the full-size frame I continued to crack when I was drilling screws I have to provide myself for an overpriced item. I feel that it could have at least provided screws. It did its purpose but I was not impress for the amount of money I paid for this
customer_reviews.author: AnneBashaway

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Definitely need a box spring!
customer_reviews.text: I've never given a one start review before. You NEED a box spring with this! I bought a similar one before and it broke in less than a week. This one feels like it was going to be the same story. But we grabbed a box spring and it feels more stable now. Not sure that we even need this. It seems cheap and worthless!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M.

customer_reviews.title: a little big, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: had to cut down 1/2" to fit bed frame but, work well. Came faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Polishspy

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit the frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to line my son's bed. I just bought him a standard sized metal bed frame and needed slats. These slats are too long (width wise) and don't fit his bed frame. So I had to shift them every other one is poking over the bed frame. This sucks but I am making it work.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, very unstable. Bows in the middle. Also, a full inch too long for my standard full size frame.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: had to cut an ich or so off the slat to fit our bed. Other than that works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Antlers

customer_reviews.title: Other than that these work great!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly too long, had to trim to size needed. Other than that these work great!
customer_reviews.author: ash0303

customer_reviews.title: 😎
customer_reviews.text: The slats was a little bit wider than expected, but I made them fit.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnsterBear

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Slipped off the frame so much that I cannot use it. I would like to return it, but it was too late. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do but as others have pointed out, the slats are too wide. Had to cut 1” off all the slats with a circular saw. I didn’t realize I was buying a diy product
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Fits absolutely perfect! I was a little scared seeing all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits absolutely perfect! I was a little scared seeing all the reviews about them not fitting a full size bed, but I guess they just didn't measure right. I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, fit & finish
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, high quality components and a lot of attention to detail. This item took me about 10 minutes to assemble,the item works perfectly well with a normal, innerspring mattress And, this is really good, to dis-assemble. So if you are likely to move, much easier to transport than a traditional box spring.
customer_reviews.author: NP

product_meta.title: Continental Matress 1.5-Inch Standard Mattress Support Wooden Bunkie Board/Slats, Full, Beige
product_meta.description: The Continental mattress Slats, provides an excellent surface foundation for any platform beds, bunks and daybeds. It adds support to any mattress type and will keep mattress stay in good shape thus extending the life of your mattress. The thirteen wooden slats made out of solid wood are linked to prevent movement during use, and they effortlessly extend your mattress's life span and prevent sagging. It will give a firm Bottom support for the mattress. These can be avoided with the use of a bunk board. Using a bunk board doubles the mattress' Life expectancy. This bunk board is a good alternative in lieu of a box spring that may be too high for day beds. It will give the bed a lift without adding much Height. This bunk board is strong enough to be used directly on bed frame in lieu of a box spring.
feature_bullets: PLEASE MEASURE BEFORE ORDERING: these slats fit standard size bed. Please measure to make sure this will fit the width of your bed
SLAT IS STRONG: enough to be used directly on bed frame
ELIMINATES NEED FOR LINKED SPRINGS: the bed slats are connected for easy installation
GREATE REPLACEMENT: for broken or damaged bed slats
NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: just remove from Packaging and put in place/ Ideal for platform beds, bunk beds, and daybeds
SLATS WIDTH: Twin & Twin xl-39, full & full xl-54, Queen-60, King-76
AMOUNT OF SLATS: twin-13, Twin xl-14, full-13, queen-14, king-14, Cal. King-14
SPACE BETWEEN SLATS: Measure 2. 4" For the twin & Full Size. 2. 3" For the Queen & King size

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars21 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
